name: Lamp (Little Big Games)
description:
Inspired by a short hike, and retro 3d platformers, Lamp is a story about a moth that can't fly.

We wanted to tell a story about overcoming adversity by focusing on character movement limitations and learning how to overcome these barriers through other characters.

This project was made amongst a team of 5 friends! We had a blast coming up with big ideas for the story we wanted to tell.  It was fun creating a little world and trying new things.  We all tried something new during this development and are proud of what we made. There's still a lot of things we wish we could have added but there's only so many hours in a day. If you're wanting more, let us know!
